302755.「あ～！ なつかしいぜ。ドワチャッカ大陸も\n いろいろ 変わっちまったみてえだ:
Ahhh...! Dwachakka Continent has changed a
lot, but this place is still the same.

302756.<center>久しいな 閃光王カブよ。\nそれに 震天王ナンナ 賢哲王ドルタム:
It's been a long time since I've seen you,
Flash King Kabu. And HeavenshakerNanna, Doltam
the Wise.

302757.「いよう！ イプチャル！\n ４０００年ぶりか。元気にしてたか？:
Yppchal! Yppchal! It's been 4000 years. How
are you?

302758.「相変わらず かたっくるしい じいさまだねぇ。\n 仰々しい呼び名は ナシにしと:
You're still a cherished old man, aren't you?
Don't call me that. It makes my back itch.

302759.「お おひさしぶりです イプチャル様。: Oh long time no see, Mr. Yppchal.

302760.<center>ふたたび お前たち三闘士と\n相まみえる日が 来ようとは。\nあ:
I never thought that the day would come when I
would once again face you and Triad. I
remember the day of our vows.

302761.「そうそう。アタシたちはさ\n ここで 義兄弟の契りを結んで\n 三闘士に なっ:
That's right. We made a contract of righteous
sibling here and became a Triad.

302762.「ここから オレたちの冒険が始まったんだ。\n 長い 長い 希望への旅路が……。:
This is where our adventure began. A long,
long journey of hope.

302763.「じつはよう……<pc>。\n ここに 連れてきてもらったのは\n お前と やり:
Actually, yo...<pc>. I brought you
here because I want to do something with you.

302764.「これから始まるのは アストルティアの\n 命運を 分ける戦いだ。:
What is about to begin is a battle for the
fate of Astoltia.

302765.「オレたちに 敗北は許されない。\n ジア・クトどもから 大事なモンを守るため\:
We can't allow ourselves to be defeated. We
must win at all costs to protect our precious
things from Dia Kut!

302766.「あー そのためによう。お前と オレたちの絆を\n より強固にして 戦いに挑む必:
Ah, that's why. That's why I thought we needed
to strengthen the bond between you and us and
take on the battle. Yeah.

302767.「えっと つまりよう……。\n お前さえ 良ければなんだが\n オレたちと……そ:
Well, I mean, you know. I mean, if you don't
mind me saying, we're...

302768.「あ～っ もう！ まだるっこしいねぇ！\n 要するに！ アタシたち アンタと\n:
Ah~~, already! You're still so slow, aren't
you? In short! We want to be "siblings" with
you.

302769.「あなたと ここで 義兄弟の契りを\n 結びたいんだ。ボクたち 三闘士にとって\:
I want to make a contract of righteous sibling
with you here. You are a special person to us
Triad.

302770.「そうだ！ お前が いっしょにいてくれたら\n オレたち どんな困難なことだって:
That's right! If you're with me, I feel like
we can always accomplish whatever is
difficult.

302771.「だから 頼む！ オレたちの義兄弟に……\n 大地の四闘士に なってくれないか？:
So, please! Will you become our righteous
sibling, the Four Horsemen of the Earth?<yesno><close>

302772.「気は進まないかもしれないけど お願い……！\n ボクたちが この戦いを 勝ち抜:
I know you don't want to do this, but please!
If we are to win this battle, we desperately
need you.<yesno><close>

302773.「……ほ 本当かッ？ 本当に本当だな？\n もう イヤだって言ったって\n 聞か:
Really? Are you sure? I won't listen to you
even if you say no more.

302774.「ひゃっほ～～～～うッ！\n やった やった やったぁ～！\n サンキュ～ <p:
Hyaho~~~~ ugh! I did it, I did it, I did it~!
Thank you~ <pc>~!

302775.「兄者ってば 断られたら どうしようって\n 直前まで ビクビクしてたんだよ。:
I was so nervous right up until the last
minute, wondering what I would do if he turned
me down.

302776.「ま！ アタシは\n アンタなら 必ず 引き受けてくれるって\n 最初から 信じ:
I believed from the beginning that you would definitely take care of me! I believed from the beginning that you would definitely take
care of it.

302777.「えへへ。改めて よろしくね。\n <pc>……兄ちゃん。:
Hehehe. Nice to meet you again.
<pc>...Brother.

302778.「えへへ。改めて よろしくね。\n <pc>……姉ちゃん。:
Hehehe. Nice to meet you again.
<pc>...Sis.

302779.「よぉし！ そうと決まれば\n やることは ひとつだ！\n ほら <pc>！ こ:
All right! Once that's decided, there's only
one thing to do! Come on, <pc>! Come
here!

302780.「たとえ 生まれた場所\n 生まれた時代が 違ったって 関係ねえ！\n オレたち:
It doesn't matter where we were born or when
we were born! We are bound by a strong bond.

302781.「オレたちが チカラを合わせれば\n かなわないことなんて 何もない……。\n:
If we work together, there is nothing we can't
accomplish. We can fight Eye of Evil!

302782.「そうさ！\n アタシたちの故郷を……アストルティアを\n ジア・クトどもの 好:
That's right! We will not let Dia Kut do what
they want to Astoltia, our homeland!

302783.「絶対に 負けたりなんかしない。\n 民を 大地を 希望を……未来を！\n ボク:
We will never lose. Our people, our land, our
hope, our future! We will protect them with
our own hands!

302784.「我ら 大地の四闘士！\n 母なる大地 アストルティアを守ると誓う！:
We, the Four Fighters of the Earth! We swear
to defend our Mother Earth, Astoltia!

302785.<center>その誓い たしかに 聞きとどけた。\n四闘士よ アストルティアの:
I have heard your oath, and I have heard it.
Four fighters, the future of Astoltia has been
entrusted to you.

302786.「いくぜぇ お前たち！\n この戦い……必ず 勝つぞッ！:
Let's go, boys! We're going to win this battle
for sure!

302788.「へへっ 付き合ってくれて ありがとな。\n そんじゃ フォーリオンに戻るとする:
Thanks for hanging out with me. Well then,
back to Fourion! Let's go <pc>!
